results.title: Selena
results.brief_description: In this biographical drama, Selena Quintanilla is born into a musical Mexican-American family in Texas. Her father, Abraham, realizes that his young daughter is talented and begins performing with her at small venues. She finds success and falls for her guitarist, Chris Perez, who draws the ire of her father. Seeking mainstream stardom, Selena begins recording an English-language album which, tragically, she would never complete.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

Her father, Abraham, realizes that his young daughter is talented and begins performing with her at small venues. She finds success and falls for her guitarist, Chris Perez, who draws the ire of her father. Seeking mainstream stardom, Selena begins recording an English-language album which, tragically, she would never complete.

Seeking mainstream stardom, Selena begins recording an English-language album which, tragically, she would never complete.

results.title: Searching
results.brief_description: After David Kim’s 16-year-old daughter goes missing, a local investigation is opened and a detective is assigned to the case. But 37 hours later and without a single lead, David decides to search the one place no one has looked yet, where all secrets are kept today: his daughter’s laptop.

constellations_other.name: Screen story searching
constellations_other.description: Cinema, smartphones and sensuality collide in this intriguing Constellation that takes a distinctly different path.

constellations_other.name: Home movies, fiction and reality blurred
constellations_other.description: The accessibility and portability of cameras has had a big impact on how we see ourselves and the world. As camera technology continues to evolve, so do our ways of seeing, with the line between reality and fiction disappearing.

results.description: After David Kim’s 16-year-old daughter goes missing, a local investigation is opened and a detective is assigned to the case. But 37 hours later and without a single lead, David decides to search the one place no one has looked yet, where all secrets are kept today: his daughter’s laptop.

video_links.name: SEARCHING - Official International Trailer - In Cinemas September 2018

results.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
results.headline_credit: Canada, Japan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2010
results.brief_description: As bass guitarist for a garage-rock band, Scott Pilgrim has never had trouble getting a girlfriend; usually, the problem is getting rid of them. But when Ramona Flowers skates into his heart, he finds she has the most troublesome baggage of all: an army of ex-boyfriends who will stop at nothing to eliminate him from her list of suitors.

constellations_other.name: Pink, Pose, punk, Pilgrim
constellations_other.description: Alice Babidge's costume design for True History of the Kelly Gang sees the iconic foursome and their accomplices in dresses, a gender-expansive stance that connects to other rebellious outlooks on the world.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Canada, Japan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2010

results.title: Schindler's List
results.brief_description: Oskar Schindler, a German industrialist and member of the Nazi party, tries to save his Jewish employees after witnessing the persecution of Jews in Poland in Steven Spielberg’s Academy Award-winning masterpiece.

constellations_other.name: Colour and creativity
constellations_other.description: From dying film to Technicolor and beyond, creative applications of colour have been part of cinema since its inception.

results.description: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.
description_for_label: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory during World War II.

results.title: Saturday Night Live
results.brief_description: A late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels. The show’s comedy sketches, which parody contemporary culture and politics, are performed by a large and varying cast of repertory and newer cast members. Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest, who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast, and features performances by a musical guest.

constellations_other.name: Women and crime
constellations_other.description: The allure and fascination of dangerous women and women in danger.

results.description: A late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels. The show’s comedy sketches, which parody contemporary culture and politics, are performed by a large and varying cast of repertory and newer cast members. Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest, who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast, and features performances by a musical guest.

Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest, who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast, and features performances by a musical guest.

results.title: Satantango
results.brief_description: In Bela Tarr’s seven-hour episodic film, inhabitants of a small village in Hungary deal with the effects of the fall of Communism.
results.description: Inhabitants of a small village in Hungary deal with the effects of the fall of Communism. The town’s source of revenue, a factory, has closed, and the locals, who include a doctor and three couples, await a cash payment offered in the wake of the shuttering. Irimias, a villager thought to be dead, returns and, unbeknownst to the locals, is a police informant. In a scheme, he persuades the villagers to form a commune with him.
description_for_label: Inhabitants of a small village in Hungary deal with the effects of the fall of Communism. The town’s source of revenue, a factory, has closed, and the locals, who include a doctor and three couples, await a cash payment offered in the wake of the shuttering. Irimias, a villager thought to be dead, returns and, unbeknownst to the locals, is a police informant. In a scheme, he persuades the villagers to form a commune with him.

results.title: Samson and Delilah
results.brief_description: Samson and Delilah’s world is small- an isolated community in the Central Australian desert. When tragedy strikes they turn their backs on home and embark on a journey of survival. Lost, unwanted and alone the discover that life isn’t always fair, but love never judges.

constellations_other.name: The Lumière brothers
constellations_other.description: The Lumière brothers understood the potential of cinema to be exhibited theatrically. Only one person could watch films through Thomas Edison's Kinetograph, while Auguste and Louis exhibited their films to thousands with Cinematographe.

constellations_other.name: Warwick Thornton
constellations_other.description: Brimming with Shakespearean undertones and pathos, Kaytetye filmmaker Warwick Thornton's debut feature Samson and Delilah is both a universal tale and one intrinsically tied to the experience of First Peoples in Central Australia.

results.description: Samson and Delilah’s world is small- an isolated community in the Central Australian desert. When tragedy strikes they turn their backs on home and embark on a journey of survival. Lost, unwanted and alone the discover that life isn’t always fair, but love never judges.

results.title: Russian Ark
results.creator_credit: Russian Ministry of Culture, YLE and NHK
results.headline_credit: Canada, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Japan and Russia, 2002
results.brief_description: A 2002 experimental historical drama film by Alexander Sokurov features an unnamed narrator wandering through the Winter Palace in Saint Petersburg, who implies that he died in some horrible accident and is a ghost drifting through the corridors.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Russian Ministry of Culture, YLE and NHK
results.headline_credit_for_label: Canada, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Japan and Russia, 2002
results.description: A French marquis wanders through a vast labyrinth of corridors, theaters and ballrooms at a reception for a Persian ambassador.
description_for_label: A French marquis wanders through a vast labyrinth of corridors, theaters and ballrooms at a reception for a Persian ambassador.

creators_other.name: Ministry of Culture of the Russian Federation
Die Beauftragte der Bundesregierung für Kultur und Medien

results.title: RuPaul's Drag Race
results.brief_description: Join RuPaul, the world’s most famous drag queen in the ultimate drag competition. America’s top drag queens vie for drag stardom as RuPaul, in full glamazon drag, reigns supreme in all judging and eliminations while helping guide the contestants.

constellations_other.name: Reality TV me
constellations_other.description: Cult documentary Grey Gardens follows the everyday eccentricities of mother and daughter Big Edie and Little Edie. The women perform and speak candidly to the camera, and have been described as predecessors to reality TV stars.

constellations_other.name: Joy of drag
constellations_other.description: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert is a groundbreaking Australian film with a small budget and big impact that's taken queer Australian stories to the world.

results.description: Join RuPaul, the world’s most famous drag queen, as the host, mentor and judge for the ultimate in drag queen competitions. The top drag queens in the U.S. will vie for drag stardom as RuPaul, in full glamazon drag, will reign supreme in all judging and eliminations while helping guide the contestants as they prepare for each challenge.
description_for_label: Join RuPaul, the world’s most famous drag queen, as the host, mentor and judge for the ultimate in drag queen competitions. The top drag queens in the U.S. will vie for drag stardom as RuPaul, in full glamazon drag, will reign supreme in all judging and eliminations while helping guide the contestants as they prepare for each challenge.

results.title: Rugrats
results.creator_credit: Susan Ward, David Blum and Klasky-Csupo
results.brief_description: Rugrats focuses on a group of toddlers and their day-to-day lives, usually involving common life experiences that become adventures in the babies’ imaginations.

constellations_other.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_other.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

results.description: Focuses on a group of toddlers, most prominently Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil, and Angelica, and their day-to-day lives, usually involving common life experiences that become adventures in the babies’ imaginations. Adults in the series are almost always unaware of what the children are up to; however, this only provides more room for the babies to explore and discover their surroundings.

Adults in the series are almost always unaware of what the children are up to; however, this only provides more room for the babies to explore and discover their surroundings.
